articles.description: A summary of current US domestic news includes discussions on the security of online voting, Travis Scott's release by Paris police, allegations of hacking in Trump's campaign, and various political updates. Harris leads Trump in battleground states, and the debate over Fed policy continues ahead of the presidential election.
articles.content:
In Las Vegas, cybersecurity experts tested a new online voting platform called Secure Internet Voting (SIV). The platform aims to allow voting via phones or computers and is being piloted in the US to identify digital vulnerabilities.

articles.title: Pelosi Rallies for Harris' Presidential Campaign in California Fundraiser
articles.description: Former U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris' presidential campaign at a California fundraiser, raising millions of dollars.
